name: Michael Johnson Fort Lytton
description:
Wartime smuggling -The Fort is run by civilian volunteers who are stealing exotic cargo from passing merchant vessels, small boats that are making their way to port. With some intercepts getting out of control and the crew members hurt, in attempt to cover up the raids you have been taken back to Fort Lytton and are being held on trumped up charges of spying and will be interrogated.

All the Soldiers have gone on another raid and you have an opportunity to escape the fort. There are five hidden keys placed around the fort, find the correct key to the main gate and escape to freedom.

VR interactable:

- Notes

- Keys

- Apples/pears

- Buckets

- Tools

- Torch

- Bottles

- Pillows

- Chairs

- Story telling elements
